mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILESTORAGE (REF_ID, FTYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, STORED_NAME, PAYLOAD, FSIZE, UPLOAD_DATE, DELFLAG) VALUES(#{ref_id}, '01', #{origin_name}, #{stored_name}, #{payload}, #{fsize}, CURRENT_DATE , 'N' )

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO FILESTORAGE (REF_ID, FTYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, STORED_NAME, PAYLOAD, FSIZE, UPLOAD_DATE, DELFLAG) VALUES(#{fileStorageVo.ref_id}, '01', #{fileStorageVo.origin_name}, #{fileStorageVo.stored_name}, #{fileStorageVo.payload}, #{fileStorageVo.fsize}, CURRENT_DATE , 'N' )
